prodDesc: Our bread and butter pickles with a delicious BBQ flavor & smoky chipotle twist.
A great “Bread and Butter” style Pickle.  Thinly sliced fresh cucumbers and Onions sweetened up in this awesome recipe passed down from Grandma Cora.
Bread and Butter pickle with a Jalapeno kick.
Our traditional Dill Pickle.  Nothing Fancy in the recipe.  Just awesome fresh tasting pickles, heavy on the fresh Dill.  Ripple cut and crunchy.
Our traditional Dill Pickles with a little scoop of our fresh chopped Habaneros.  You’ll love the punch and flavor of these one of a kind fresh pickles.
